pr_title: Add more metrics to our cluster and user operators

timeline.bodyText: if we could assume that strimzi.reconciliations is a sort of root for the reconciliations related metrics, should the others be strimzi.reconciliations.periodical and not the other way around?
timeline.author: ppatierno

timeline.bodyText: isn't it enough one failedReconciliationsCounter.increment(); call out of this if and elseif statements?
timeline.author: ppatierno

replies.bodyText: No, because I do not think we should report when the reconciliation fails to obtain a lock as a failure.
replies.author: scholzj

timeline.author: sknot-rh
